name: Most Paid Clients
query: select customer.name "ID:Link/Customer:100", CONCAT('',customer.customer_name,'') as "customer:Data:180", SUM(sales.grand_total) as "grand total:Currency:150", SUM(sales.outstanding_amount) as "outstanding amount:Currency:150", SUM(sales.grand_total) - SUM(sales.outstanding_amount) as "paid amount:Currency:150" from `tabCustomer` as customer INNER JOIN `tabSales Invoice` as sales on customer.name = sales.customer where sales.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s and sales.status != "Draft" and sales.status != "Cancelled" group by customer.name order by SUM(sales.grand_total) DESC
